explains: adj. 自给自足的；极为自负的；过于自信的

sentences.en: The swift growth of this merchant marine diversified the northern colonial economy and made it more self-sufficient.
sentences.cn: 这艘商船的迅速发展使北方殖民地经济多样化，使其自给自足的能力更强。

sentences.en: After 1815 improved transportation enabled more and more western farmers to escape a self-sufficient way of life and enter a national market economy.
sentences.cn: 1815年以后，交通的改善使越来越多的西方农民摆脱了自给自足的生活方式，进入了国家市场经济。

sentences.en: The country is totally self-sufficient in food production.
sentences.cn: 在粮食生产上，这个国家完全做到了自给自足。
